verses.text: The \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* with a \w pen|strong="H5842"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \add and\add* with the \w point|strong="H6856"\w* of a \w diamond|strong="H8068"\w*: \add it is\add* \w graven|strong="H2790"\w* upon the \w table|strong="H3871"\w* of their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of your \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*;\f + \fr 17.1 \ft point: Heb. nail\f*

Whilst their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* their \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* and their \w groves|strong="H0842"\w* by the \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* upon the \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*.

O my \w mountain|strong="H2042"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w substance|strong="H2428"\w* \add and\add* all thy \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* to the \w spoil|strong="H0957"\w*, \add and\add* thy high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* for \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, throughout all thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

And thou, even thyself, shalt \w discontinue|strong="H8058"\w* from thine \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* that I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee; and I will cause thee to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not: for ye have \w kindled|strong="H6919"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, \add which\add* shall \w burn|strong="H3344"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 17.4 \ft thyself: Heb. in thyself\f*

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and \w maketh|strong="H7760"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and whose \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w departeth|strong="H5493"\w* from the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

For he shall be like the \w heath|strong="H6199"\w* in the \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*, and shall not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* when \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*; but shall \w inhabit|strong="H7931"\w* the parched \w places|strong="H2788"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add in\add* a \w salt|strong="H4420"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* and not \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H1397"\w* that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and whose \w hope|strong="H4009"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* is.

For he shall be as a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* by the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and \add that\add* spreadeth \w out|strong="H7971"\w* her \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* by the \w river|strong="H3105"\w*, and shall not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* when \w heat|strong="H2527"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, but her \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* shall be \w green|strong="H7488"\w*; and shall not be \w careful|strong="H1672"\w* in the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w drought|strong="H1226"\w*, neither shall \w cease|strong="H4185"\w* from \w yielding|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*.\f + \fr 17.8 \ft drought: or, restraint\f*
¶ The \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* \w deceitful|strong="H6121"\w* above all \add things\add*, and desperately \w wicked|strong="H0605"\w*: who can \w know|strong="H3045"\w* it?

I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w search|strong="H2713"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \add I\add* \w try|strong="H0974"\w* the \w reins|strong="H3629"\w*, even to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \add and\add* according to the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of his \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

\add As\add* the \w partridge|strong="H7124"\w* \w sitteth|strong="H1716"\w* \add on eggs\add*, and \w hatcheth|strong="H3205"\w* \add them\add* not; \add so\add* he that \w getteth|strong="H6213"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, and not by \w right|strong="H4941"\w*, shall \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* them in the \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* of his \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and at his \w end|strong="H0319"\w* shall be a \w fool|strong="H5036"\w*.\f + \fr 17.11 \ft sitteth…: or, gathereth young which she hath not brought forth\f*

¶ A \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* from the \w beginning|strong="H7223"\w* \add is\add* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of our \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*.

O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w hope|strong="H4723"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, all that \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, \add and\add* they that \w depart|strong="H3249"\w* from \w me|strong="H5493"\w* shall be \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, because they have \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, the \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* of \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Heal|strong="H7495"\w* me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and I shall be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*; \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me, and I shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*: for thou \add art\add* my \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.
¶ Behold, they \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, Where \add is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? let it \w come|strong="H0935"\w* now.

As for me, I have not \w hastened|strong="H0213"\w* from \add being\add* a \w pastor|strong="H7462"\w* to \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* thee: neither have I \w desired|strong="H0183"\w* the \w woeful|strong="H0605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w*: that which came \w out|strong="H4161"\w* of my \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* was \add right\add* \w before|strong="H5227"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 17.16 \ft to…: Heb. after thee\f*
Be not a \w terror|strong="H4288"\w* unto me: thou \add art\add* my \w hope|strong="H4268"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

Let them be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* that \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* me, but let not me be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*: let them be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*, but let not me be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*: \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* upon them the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and \w destroy|strong="H7665"\w* them with \w double|strong="H4932"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7670"\w*.\f + \fr 17.18 \ft destroy…: Heb. break them with a double breach\f*

¶ Thus \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me; \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, whereby the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and by the which they go \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and in all the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, that enter \w in|strong="H0935"\w* by these \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to \w yourselves|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* no \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, nor \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add* in by the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*;

Neither carry \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* a \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* out of your \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, neither \w do|strong="H6213"\w* ye any \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, but \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* ye the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, as I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

But they \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* not, neither \w inclined|strong="H5186"\w* their \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, but made their \w neck|strong="H6203"\w* \w stiff|strong="H7185"\w*, that they might not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, nor \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, if ye \w diligently|strong="H8085"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* in no \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* through the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, but \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H1115"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w* therein;

Then shall there \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* and \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* in \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* and on \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, they, and their \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: and this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and from the places \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, and from the \w plain|strong="H8219"\w*, and from the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and from the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, \w bringing|strong="H0935"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, and meat \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, and \w incense|strong="H3828"\w*, and \w bringing|strong="H0935"\w* sacrifices of \w praise|strong="H8426"\w*, unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

But if ye will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me to \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and not to \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* a \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*, even entering \w in|strong="H0935"\w* at the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; then will I \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* thereof, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and it shall not be \w quenched|strong="H3518"\w*.
